title: MEMORY_NOVICE
description: Complete the Easy level in the Element Memory Match game

title: Memory Intermediate
description: Complete the Medium level in the Element Memory Match game

title: Memory Master
description: Complete the Hard level in the Element Memory Match game

title: QUICK_MATCHMAKER
description: Complete the Easy level within 20 turns

title: Score Hunter
description: Accumulate a total score of 100 points or more

title: Master Matcher
description: Complete all three difficulty levels in the Element Memory Match game

title: Streak Starter
description: Achieve a 5-match streak without any mistakes

title: Perfect Easy
description: Complete the Easy level without making a single wrong match

title: Time Challenger
description: Complete the Medium level in under 60 seconds

title: Element Expert
description: Match all elements correctly on the Hard level with less than 5 mistakes

title: Speed Master
description: Complete any level in half the average number of turns

title: Flawless Finish
description: Finish the Hard level without a single incorrect match
